snippet: Sheryl Sandberg, the chief operating officer, told marketers Facebook was focused on proving the promise of advertising.
abstract: Facebook makes confident pitch to advertisers in New York, as it faces pressure to increase revenue and prove to Madison Avenue that money spent on the social network will yield measurable results; company says it knows how to market messages to consumers on its platform because of the amount of data it has on its users and what it has learned about their behavior and tastes.
lead_paragraph: Sheryl Sandberg, the chief operating officer, told marketers Facebook was focused on proving the promise of advertising.

headline.seo: Facebook Delivers Confident Pitch to Advertisers
headline.main: Facebook Delivers a Confident Sales Pitch to Advertisers
